Articles.Content:
So yeah I landed on Mun. I'd like to thank Phildrin and Bobvis for throwing up in the purposely designed bags. Also, the SAS Unit, without whom nothing would have been possible.

Finally, thank sisney for not having jettisoned the landing engine before it was impossible to catch this error, and the avionics cone for slapping him in the face on the picture.

Well, we still did it with those morons. I wonder how every single time.
Great work, you bringing them home too?
What does the lander look like when it's intact?
